mapper.select: select message from alarm where alarm_code = #{alarmCode}

select u.user_name, d.approval_count from alarm_history h join approval_doc d on d.approval_doc_id = h.approval_doc_id join approval a on d.approval_doc_id = a.approval_doc_id join organization_user o on o.org_user_id = a.org_user_id join user u on o.user_id = u.user_id where a.approval_order = 1 and h.alarm_id = #{alarmId};
select count(*) from alarm_history where confirmation_status = 0 and org_user_id = #{orgUserId};
mapper.update: update alarm_history set confirmation_status = 1 where alarm_id = #{alarmId};
